articles.title: Sick of winter? Here’s what spring will look like in New England, per the Old Farmer’s Almanac
articles.description:
The guide predicts warmer-than-average temperatures and drier conditions across much of the region.

The post Sick of winter? Here’s what spring will look like in New England, per the Old Farmer’s Almanac appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Old Farmer’s Almanac predicts warmer-than-average temperatures for New England this spring.
Drier conditions expected across the region, benefiting local outdoor activities.
Boston residents may enjoy an early start to spring gardening and outdoor events.
